apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.subtitle: Access AfriTrace mineral verification data programmatically
apiDocs.overviewDesc: The AfriTrace API provides programmatic access to mineral certification data, enabling businesses and developers to integrate traceability verification into their supply chain systems. Our API follows RESTful principles and returns JSON-formatted responses.
apiDocs.authDesc: All API requests require authentication using an API key. Contact our team at fabriceib2005@gmail.com to obtain your API credentials.
apiDocs.verifyDesc: Verify a mineral certificate or batch code against REMA and ICGLR databases.
apiDocs.listDesc: Retrieve a paginated list of verified mineral certificates.
apiDocs.feedbackDesc: Submit community feedback or environmental concerns (requires user authentication).
apiDocs.rateLimitsDesc: 1000 requests per hour per API key
apiDocs.batchDesc: Use bulk endpoints for multiple verifications
apiDocs.error400: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or malformed request
apiDocs.error401: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key
apiDocs.error404: Not Found - Certificate or resource does not exist
apiDocs.error429: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded
apiDocs.error500: Server Error - Contact support if persistent
apiDocs.helpDesc: For API access requests, technical support, or to report issues, contact our developer team:

dataStandards.title: Data Standards
dataStandards.subtitle: Comprehensive framework ensuring data quality, security, and interoperability
dataStandards.overviewDesc: AfriTrace adheres to internationally recognized data standards to ensure consistency, reliability, and interoperability across the mineral supply chain. Our data standards are designed to meet regulatory requirements while maintaining the highest levels of data quality and security.
dataStandards.rwandaLawDesc: Compliance with Rwanda Mines and Geology Act for domestic operations
dataStandards.icglrDesc: International Conference on the Great Lakes Region standards
dataStandards.oecdDesc: Guidelines for responsible mineral supply chains
dataStandards.accuracyDesc: All data verified against primary sources (REMA, mining cooperatives)
dataStandards.completenessDesc: Mandatory fields must be populated for certificate issuance
dataStandards.timelinessDesc: Real-time updates within 24 hours of status changes
dataStandards.consistencyDesc: Standardized formats across all data entries
dataStandards.csvExportDesc: Bulk data export in standardized formats
dataStandards.ediIntegrationDesc: Electronic Data Interchange for supply chain systems
dataStandards.rmiComplianceDesc: Compatible with Responsible Minerals Initiative reporting
dataStandards.encryptionDesc: AES-256 encryption for data at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit
dataStandards.auditLoggingDesc: Comprehensive logging of all data access and modifications
dataStandards.dataVersioningDesc: All data modifications are tracked with version control. Historical records are maintained for audit purposes, ensuring traceability of changes over time. API versioning follows semantic versioning principles to maintain backward compatibility.
dataStandards.questionsDesc: For inquiries about data integration, standards compliance, or technical specifications:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introDesc: AfriTrace is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you use our mineral traceability platform. We comply with the Rwandan Data Protection and Privacy Law and the African Union Convention on Cyber Security and Personal Data Protection.
privacy.personalInfoDesc: Name, email address, phone number, and organization details when you create an account
privacy.usageDataDesc: IP address, browser type, pages visited, and interaction with our platform
privacy.miningDataDesc: Certificate verification requests, batch codes, and supply chain information
privacy.feedbackDataDesc: Community feedback, environmental concerns, and user-submitted reports
privacy.verify: To verify mineral certificates and maintain the traceability system
privacy.improve: To improve our services and develop new features
privacy.communicate: To communicate with you about account updates and system changes
privacy.comply: To comply with legal obligations and regulatory requirements
privacy.analyze: To analyze platform usage and generate aggregated statistics
privacy.authoritiesDesc: REMA, ICGLR, and other mining regulatory bodies as required by law
privacy.partnersDesc: Authorized stakeholders for certificate verification purposes
privacy.serviceProvidersDesc: Third-party vendors who assist in platform operations (under strict confidentiality)
privacy.legalRequirementsDesc: When required by law, court order, or governmental regulation
privacy.dataSecurityDesc: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption (AES-256), secure data transmission (TLS 1.3), regular security audits, access controls and authentication, and data backup and disaster recovery protocols.
privacy.accessRight: Access your personal data and request corrections
privacy.deleteRight: Request deletion of your personal information
privacy.exportRight: Export your data in a machine-readable format
privacy.withdrawRight: Withdraw consent for data processing (where applicable)
privacy.objectRight: Object to certain types of data processing
privacy.dataRetentionDesc: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy. Account data is retained while your account is active. Mining and certification data is retained for 10 years to comply with regulatory requirements. Feedback and reports are retained for 5 years for analysis and compliance purposes.
privacy.childrenPrivacyDesc: Our platform is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
privacy.internationalTransfersDesc: Your data may be processed in Rwanda or other countries where our service providers operate. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for cross-border data transfers.
privacy.policyChangesDesc: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through a prominent notice on our platform.
privacy.contactUsDesc: For privacy-related inquiries or to exercise your data rights:
privacy.address: Address: Kigali, Rwanda - KN 4 Ave, Nyarugenge
